title: With BSC coming, to propose to revert back to original tokenomics (6.9milk2 minted with no lock-up)
body:
With BSC coming, to propose to revert back to original tokenomics (6.9milk2 minted with no lock-up) and let the market take its course. 

It has only been 2 months since discovery which we believe it is premature to assume/react hastily without the volume of community and seeing the true market potential.  

Data/Facts Gathered Thus Far:
1.	Spaceswap was doing really well gaining good momentum in recognition and price appreciation before the coordinated FUD attacks. 

2.	We then regain back the confidence of public especially when the Dev are working hard rolling out new features and initiatives rapidly. 

3.	With BSC is around the corner, there will be more anticipated investments coming in due to the low gas fees. 

4.	We are only at our two months market realization since discovery.

5.	We humbly propose to revert back to the original tokenomics where 6.9milk2 gets minted with no lock-up whatsoever. 

6.	The point is it is too early to make any changes without the volume of strong community and let the market takes it course for a few months at least. 

7.	We will then (about 3-6 months later) put up a proposal to get Spaceswap to hire a tokenomics expert with yield farming track records to design a better eco-system and re-vote for it. 
We appreciate your understanding on this and let’s continue to build a growing community.
author: 0xB047e5845cE7c26C915A5b4861d990f61B77e4a4
